sentences: Co-facilitator George Wamukoya presented the co-facilitators§ technical suggestions, which were developed in response to parties§ call for a discussion tool for this section.

He underlined that parties had a "very useful" exchange on concepts around the themes and sub-headings of the section, which served as a basis for the technical suggestions. He outlined the paragraphs in the two options contained in the consolidated text, and parties agreed to forward it to the ADP Co-Chairs as input to prepare a streamlined text before the next ADP session.
